amendment.description: Amendment ensures Members of Congress know when VA employees are fired or demoted at VA facilities in their district for misconduct or poor performance and are aware of whistleblowers' complaints from VA employees.
amendment.purpose: Amendment ensures Members of Congress know when VA employees are fired or demoted at VA facilities in their district for misconduct or poor performance and are aware of whistleblowers' complaints from VA employees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lujan Grisham (NM) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Lujan Grisham (NM).
